org.jasig.cas.support.rest

Class RegisteredServiceResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jasig.cas.support.rest.RegisteredServiceResource

  • @RestController(value="registeredServiceResourceRestController")
public class RegisteredServiceResource
extends java.lang.Object
    RestController implementation of a REST API that allows for registration of CAS services.

    4.2
